title: Well Intended Love
overview: A third-rate actress with leukemia becomes entangled with CEO Ling because she needs money for treatment.In order to receive bone marrow transplant sooner and to continue her career as an actress, Xia Lin enters into a secret marriage with Ling Yiz Hou, the CEO of a company. Despite the conspiracies and misunderstandings they encounter, the two find true love.
